analysisPopulations.name: Screened Set
analysisPopulations.description: The Screened Set will include all participants who signed an informed consent form (ICF).

analysisPopulations.name: Enrolled Set
analysisPopulations.description: The Enrolled Set will include all participants who were enrolled in the study.

analysisPopulations.name: Full Analysis Set
analysisPopulations.label: FA
analysisPopulations.description: The Full Analysis (FA) Set will include all participants who were enrolled and received at least 1 dose of study drug. The FA Set will be the primary population for all efficacy analyses.
analysisPopulations.criteria: Enrolled and received at least 1 dose of study drug

analysisPopulations.name: Per Protocol Set
analysisPopulations.label: PP
analysisPopulations.description: The Per Protocol (PP) Set will include all participants in the FA Set who have no major protocol deviations that would impact the primary efficacy endpoint.
analysisPopulations.criteria: In FA Set with no major protocol deviations impacting the primary efficacy endpoint

analysisPopulations.name: Safety Set
analysisPopulations.description: The Safety Set will include all participants who received at least 1 dose of study drug. The Safety Set will be the primary population for all safety analyses.
analysisPopulations.criteria: Received at least 1 dose of study drug

analysisPopulations.name: Pharmacokinetic Analysis Set
analysisPopulations.label: PK
analysisPopulations.description: The Pharmacokinetic (PK) Analysis Set will include all participants in the Safety Set who have sufficient plasma concentration data to allow for the derivation of at least 1 PK parameter.
analysisPopulations.criteria: In Safety Set with sufficient plasma concentration data for at least 1 PK parameter

analysisPopulations.name: Pharmacodynamic Analysis Set
analysisPopulations.label: PD
analysisPopulations.description: The Pharmacodynamic (PD) Analysis Set will include all participants in the Safety Set who have sufficient PD data to allow for the derivation of at least 1 PD parameter.
analysisPopulations.criteria: In Safety Set with sufficient PD data for at least 1 PD parameter

characteristics.name: Age
characteristics.description: Age of the participant at baseline.

characteristics.name: Wilson Disease history
characteristics.description: Wilson Disease history, including time since diagnosis and initial presentation.

characteristics.name: Baseline laboratory values
characteristics.description: Baseline laboratory values including ceruloplasmin, serum copper, and 24-hour urinary copper excretion.

characteristics.name: Baseline clinical assessments
characteristics.description: Baseline clinical assessments, including the Unified Wilsonâ€™s Disease Rating Scale (UWDRS).

characteristics.name: Medical/Surgical History
characteristics.description: Medical and surgical history of the participant.

characteristics.name: Prior medications for Wilson Disease
characteristics.description: Prior medications used to treat Wilson Disease.

characteristics.name: Body Mass Index (BMI)
characteristics.description: Body mass index calculated as weight (kg)/[height (m)]^2.
